query:
CREATE TABLE `conference_tags` (
	`conferenceId` int NOT NULL,
	`tagId` int NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE `conferences` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`name` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
	`location` varchar(255),
	`startDate` timestamp NOT NULL,
	`endDate` timestamp,
	`submissionDeadline` timestamp,
	`attendanceStatus` enum('interested','submitted','accepted','attended','rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'interested',
	`website` varchar(500),
	`notes` text,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `conferences_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
CREATE TABLE `manuscript_tags` (
	`manuscriptId` int NOT NULL,
	`tagId` int NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE `manuscripts` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`title` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
	`status` enum('draft','submitted','under_review','accepted','rejected','published') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
	`journal` varchar(255),
	`submissionDate` timestamp,
	`targetDate` timestamp,
	`notes` text,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `manuscripts_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
CREATE TABLE `meeting_tags` (
	`meetingId` int NOT NULL,
	`tagId` int NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE `meetings` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`title` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
	`date` timestamp NOT NULL,
	`duration` int,
	`participants` text,
	`location` varchar(255),
	`agenda` text,
	`notes` text,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `meetings_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
CREATE TABLE `reminder_logs` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`reminderId` int NOT NULL,
	`email` varchar(320) NOT NULL,
	`sentAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`status` enum('sent','failed','bounced') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'sent',
	`errorMessage` text,
	CONSTRAINT `reminder_logs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
CREATE TABLE `reminders` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`activityType` enum('manuscript','conference','meeting') NOT NULL,
	`activityId` int NOT NULL,
	`reminderType` enum('submission_deadline','conference_deadline','meeting_time','custom') NOT NULL,
	`daysBeforeEvent` int DEFAULT 7,
	`reminderTime` varchar(5) DEFAULT '09:00',
	`isEnabled` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
	`lastSentAt` timestamp,
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `reminders_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
CREATE TABLE `tags` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`userId` int NOT NULL,
	`name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
	`color` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '#3b82f6',
	`createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `tags_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
